import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'../ErrorModal/Index.css';import bgError from'../../assets/img/general/bg-error.png';import{clearGameInterval}from'../GameContentModal/GameContentSlice';import{showErrorAndResult}from'./ErrorSlice';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ErrorModal=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const showErrorModal=useSelector(state=>state.errorModal.showErrorModal);useEffect(()=>{if(showErrorModal){dispatch(clearGameInterval());// Ẩn modal thông báo lỗi sau 3 giây và hiển thị kết quả game
setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(showErrorAndResult());},3000);}},[showErrorModal,dispatch]);if(!showErrorModal)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"false-clicked-modal",style:{display:showErrorModal?'flex':'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bgError,alt:"false-clicked",className:"false-clicked-ing"})});};export default ErrorModal;
